Html:
Hello,

in the Side http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/10/22/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-9-changing-ribbon-colors.aspx

i online find the color-set

_ribbon.SetColors(Color.Wheat, Color.IndianRed, Color.BlueViolet);

for olive-green. Do you know the settings for other color-standards (black, blue, etc.) ?

Bye
Martin Kolb

Sorry, I don't the color definitions of a specific color-set.

However, I assume a simple trial and error process might get you the results easily.

Please let us know what you have found.
